titleStmt.title: Primitive ordination and succession of bishops, deacons, pastors, and teachers in the church of Christ by George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: This work appears on reel 1188:26 and 1461:8.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
